Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor and Network Watcher to continuously monitor the connectivity of the Azure Bastion host. Identify and resolve any connectivity issues promptly.
Ensure that the NSGs associated with the Azure Bastion subnet are correctly configured to allow required inbound and outbound traffic. Regularly review and update rules as needed.
Analyze performance metrics of the Azure Bastion host to ensure it operates within expected parameters. Investigate and address any performance bottlenecks.
Perform failover tests to verify that Azure Bastion can maintain connectivity during network disruptions or outages.
Review and update Azure Bastion host configurations to align with changes in network architecture or security requirements.
Regularly audit access logs to ensure that only authorized users are connecting to resources via Azure Bastion. Investigate any suspicious activity.
Create backups of Azure Bastion host configurations to ensure quick recovery in case of accidental changes or failures.
Evaluate Azure Bastion's performance against the SLA to ensure compliance. Address any deviations from SLA metrics.
Keep Azure Bastion service documentation up-to-date, including operational procedures, configuration details, and troubleshooting guides.
Conduct incident response drills to prepare the team for potential security incidents or Azure Bastion outages. Ensure familiarity with procedures and protocols.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding Azure Bastion performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
